titleStmt.title: A briefe remembrance of all the English monarchs with their raignes, deaths, and places of buriall : from the Normans Conquest, vnto Our Most Gratious Soueraigne / by Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: "The sheet is divided into 4 quarters, the bottom 2 containing the title and verses on Prince Charles reimposed from [STC] 23738. The upper left has an engraving of the royal arms, while the upper right is cut away. It may have contained a full-length portrait of Prince Charles."--STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
